Risk Dice Simulator is an app for quickly resolving large battles in the board game Risk.
 Use the main screen to set the variables for the battle.

 Safety - automatically stops the simulator so the safety number is not passed. If attack safety is set to 3, the attacking units will not drop below 3 (the simulator may stop at 4 because in a single attack the attacker could lose 2 units).

 Results - click the results icon in the toolbar to see the results of the latest battle.
